QuestData.Title: On Swift Wings
QuestData.Description:
Our revered Archon has decided to grace you with an audience.
It is your duty to present your discoveries to her, then follow her wise judgment.
She holds audience in Elysian Hold, part of the sprawling Spires of Ascension, the home of the Ascended.
We shall carry you there, for it is a place for those who can fly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Adrestes to Elysian Hold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Adrestes in Elysian Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: The Archon's chambers are just above. I urge you to practice extreme deference while in her presence.
